cancel-booking-dialog.title: Are you absolutely sure?
cancel-booking-dialog.description: Are you sure you want to cancel your booking? This action cannot be undone.

cancel-regular-session-dialog.title: Cancel this session?
cancel-regular-session-dialog.description: This will cancel only this specific occurrence of your regular session, not the entire recurring schedule.
cancel-regular-session-dialog.reason-placeholder: Let your tutor know why you're cancelling...
cancel-regular-session-dialog.reason-hint: This helps your tutor understand and plan accordingly.

all-scheduled-events.message: You have {count, plural, =1 {1 event} other {# events}} coming up.
all-scheduled-events.upcoming-events: You have no upcoming sessions. Book a session to get started!

event-view-card.title: All Scheduled Events
event-view-card.description: Here you can see all your scheduled events.

reschedule-dialog.title: Reschedule Booking
reschedule-dialog.description: Select a new event to reschedule your booking to.
reschedule-dialog.no-available-events: No available events found for rescheduling.

language-club.title: Language Club
language-club.subtitle: Schedule and manage your language learning sessions
language-club.no-events-description: Click on any date to view available sessions

events.calendar-description: View your events for this day

dialog.title: Choose Booking Option
dialog.subtitle: Select how you would like to book this language club session

free-card.title: Reserve Now, Pay at Event
free-card.desc: Book instantly and pay in person when you arrive.

dialog.disabled-text: Online payment will be available soon.

success-dialog.title: Booking Successful!
success-dialog.desc: You have successfully booked your language club session.
success-dialog.email-message: You will receive a confirmation email shortly.

verification.title: Verify your email
verification.subtitle: Enter verification code sent to your email

learning-preferences.title: Learning Preferences
learning-preferences.text: Customize your learning experience and goals
learning-preferences.error: You haven't set your learning preferences yet. Complete the onboarding to get started.

email-preferences.title: Email Language
email-preferences.description: Select the language for email notifications and communications

courses.title: More Than Just a Video Course
courses.subtitle: We’re building a new way to master Slovene: cinematic lessons paired with an intelligent ecosystem and smart AI tools designed to optimize your progress. Navigate a personalized path tailored to your goals supported by an extensive library of resources and exclusive live Q&A sessions.

daily-practice.title: Your Daily Slovene Practice
daily-practice.text: We’re building a daily habit-forming experience: bite-sized, interactive exercises paired with smart AI tracking to keep you consistent and motivated. Build your fluency through personalized daily challenges—from vocabulary drills to real-world listening tasks—tailored to your current level and goals. Stay on track with progress analytics and join our global community for daily streaks that turn language learning into the best part of your routine.

all.title: All tutors are fully booked
all.subtitle: We're currently at the capacity. Please check back soon for new time slots.

tutor.title: {tutor} is fully booked
tutor.subtitle: Try selecting another tutor or check back later for new availability
